frontmatter.title: Passing data through the App Store with UIPasteboard
frontmatter.staticPreview: About a year ago I wrote a puzzle game called Trestle. If you download it using this link or any of the links in this post (by clicking on them on your iOS device), you'll get a nice Easter egg and two of the (normally paid) level sets enabled for free...
